CustomField.description: What is the current U.S. military status of the student's parent or guardian
CustomField.label: SCCA Prior Military Survey

value.fullName: 01 - A Parent or Guardian is serving in the National Guard but is not deployed.
value.label: 01 - A Parent or Guardian is serving in the National Guard but is not deployed.

value.fullName: 02 - A Parent or Guardian is serving in the Reserves but is not deployed.
value.label: 02 - A Parent or Guardian is serving in the Reserves but is not deployed.

value.fullName: 03 - A Parent or Guardian is serving in the National Guard and is currently deployed.
value.label: 03 - A Parent or Guardian is serving in the National Guard and is currently deployed.

value.fullName: 04 - A Parent or Guardian is serving in the Reserves and is currently deployed.
value.label: 04 - A Parent or Guardian is serving in the Reserves and is currently deployed.

value.fullName: 05 - A Parent or Guardian is serving in the military on active duty but is not deployed.
value.label: 05 - A Parent or Guardian is serving in the military on active duty but is not deployed.

value.fullName: 06 - A Parent or Guardian is serving in the military on active duty and is currently deployed.
value.label: 06 - A Parent or Guardian is serving in the military on active duty and is currently deployed.

value.fullName: 07 - The student's Parent or Guardian died while on active duty within the last year.
value.label: 07 - The student's Parent or Guardian died while on active duty within the last year.

value.fullName: 08 - The student's Parent or Guardian was wounded while on active duty within the last year.
value.label: 08 - The student's Parent or Guardian was wounded while on active duty within the last year.

value.fullName: Neither Parent nor Guardian is serving in any military service.
value.label: Neither Parent nor Guardian is serving in any military service.
